humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 'Axillary lymph nodes: Negative for tumor (0/4)'. This means that none of the 4 assessed lymph nodes contained metastatic carcinoma. According to New Rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that four sentinel lymph nodes (1-4) were excised and examined, with no metastatic carcinoma found in any of them (0/4). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
